message:
SYSTEM: Wiki: https://delicias.dia.fi.upm.es/wiki/index.php/Reuniones 

(Feel free to add)
Action points:
Need an authoritative URI for the OEG.
Complete the annotation of our personal web pages.
Annotate the OEG web portal semantically. URIs of members have to be included to easily traverse/compose their information.
Ideas for the future:
Visualisation of different graphs (see
http://www.nandana.org/2013/02/graphs-of-ontology-engineering-group-oeg.html
)
Extraction of a common CV of publications (add links to DBLP and semanticweb.org)
Explore how other groups/universities annotate
Study relationships among people using Riccardo's similarities
Think other useful things that can be done with our RDFa annotations
